about_the_game:
Build

Each "Box" in Danglebox magnetically connects to its neighbors.

Boost

With the "Magnetic Boost" feature you have some interesting control over your constructs.

  • reconnect boxes
  • realign boxes
  • strengthen the connections while active

Ropes

Ropes are an essential part of Danglebox.

  • collect resource containers
  • bind your boxes in place or tow them around
  • rip boxes off your opponent or topple them over!

Trains

Trains will supply you with resources, but will also test the stability of your designs.

Fly

Conquer the skies with the help of balloons and thrusters!

Game Modes

  • Mission Mode: complete objectives
  • Free Play Mode: choose your starting position, play for fun or battle the AI for resources

Map Editor

  • create missions and free play maps in the included editor

Additional Features

  • 3 tiers of each: boxes, ropes and balloons
  • 3 types of weapons: cannon, rocket launcher, electric zapper
  • weapons, coolers, thrusters and storages become more powerful when next to each other
  • manually control a train or automate routes with gates
  • thrusters can be activated with direction keys, pilot your airship, rocket or spaceship!
  • temperature system, many things produce waste heat, keep your boxes cool!
  • water physics, wood boxes float!
  • variable gravity and friction, there are space maps!
detailed_description:
Build

Each "Box" in Danglebox magnetically connects to its neighbors.

Boost

With the "Magnetic Boost" feature you have some interesting control over your constructs.

  • reconnect boxes
  • realign boxes
  • strengthen the connections while active

Ropes

Ropes are an essential part of Danglebox.

  • collect resource containers
  • bind your boxes in place or tow them around
  • rip boxes off your opponent or topple them over!

Trains

Trains will supply you with resources, but will also test the stability of your designs.

Fly

Conquer the skies with the help of balloons and thrusters!

Game Modes

  • Mission Mode: complete objectives
  • Free Play Mode: choose your starting position, play for fun or battle the AI for resources

Map Editor

  • create missions and free play maps in the included editor

Additional Features

  • 3 tiers of each: boxes, ropes and balloons
  • 3 types of weapons: cannon, rocket launcher, electric zapper
  • weapons, coolers, thrusters and storages become more powerful when next to each other
  • manually control a train or automate routes with gates
  • thrusters can be activated with direction keys, pilot your airship, rocket or spaceship!
  • temperature system, many things produce waste heat, keep your boxes cool!
  • water physics, wood boxes float!
  • variable gravity and friction, there are space maps!
name: Danglebox

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX950 or higher
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Danglebox is about creating physics based structures to hunt for resources or just for fun. Build with various materials, lift with balloons, pull with ropes and push with thrusters to enable your designs to withstand the weight of trains, buildings, containers, weapons fire and more.
